name: HA Banners
author: Alex Khamdamov

sections.description:
The plugin helps to manage the banners over the WordPress blog. It is very easy to use.

create and manage banners:

  • create a banner is as easy as creating a post
  • create banners rotations
  • widget banners
  • banners statistics.

Translations

  • English
  • Russian
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->ha banners screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
1.1

This release fixes a bug in the style.css.
